fields.name: Indian Mango Lassi
fields.ingredients: ["1 cup ripe mango", "chopped", "1 cup plain yogurt", "1/2 cup milk", "2 tsp sugar", "a pinch of ground cardamom"]
fields.instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom until smooth.

fields.name: Another One
fields.ingredients: ["1 Banana", "2 tbsp Penut-Butter", "1/4 cup Oats", "1/2 cup Greek Yogurt", "1/2 cup Almond Milk", "1/4 cup Ice Cubes"]
